titleStmt.title: Now heare this all yee persecuting rulers, preists [sic], and magistrates throughout the world. Woe, woe, terror, terror, and feirce [sic] indignation from the Lord God, even the true testimony written in this book, / by the servant of the Lord Daniel Baker.
titleStmt.author: D. B. (Daniel Baker), fl. 1650-1660.
Bache, Humphrey.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing; publisher and date from colophon.
Addressed to John Waterton, Justice of the Peace. Cf. p. 2.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library, London, England.
